message: Let's start with a fair share. I'm willing to give you 10% of the money. We can adjust in the future if needed.
You started high, I'll start lower. Your turn to respond!
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 60/40.  We can't keep going back and forth like this, we'll both lose money.
I'll meet you in the middle, but I think I can do better than 40%
